title: Album Page, "Sketches from San Bernadino, Perugia, Italy", late 19th century
medium: Graphite with traces of brush and gray wash on off-white wove paper with deckled edges tipped into binding with fabric.
markings: Watermark: Double inscribed circle containing an anchor, each terminal ending in an arrow.
inscribed:
Recto, in graphite, clockwise beginning at upper left corner: wreath; upper garland; canopy; canopy; San Bernadino / Perugia; archivolt. 

The sheet is filled with inscriptions containing measurements for each architectural element.
dimensions: Sheet: 30.9 x 21 cm (12 3/16 x 8 1/4 in.), irregular
description: Vertical sheet composed of many sketches, all containing inscriptions about the various dimensions of their parts.  Above is a double-inscribed circle; below left is a molding profile; below right is an elevation of a space enclosed by a pitched roof over a round arch supported by a base and two columns.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Sketches from San Bernadino, Perugia, Italy", late 19th century.Graphite with traces of brush and gray wash on off-white wove paper with deckled edges tipped into binding with fabric.. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-290.
